rules.text: If there is no Web Wall in play, exhaust this being. »» Search the path deck and discard for a Web Wall and put it into play.
If there is no hazard in play. »» Shuffle this being into the path deck.
If you have 3 or more fatigue, exhaust this being. »» Suffer 1 injury.
X is equal to the number of bats on this swarm.
If there is an active Web Wall, the bats become entangled in it. »» Add 1[harm] to this swarm.
AWA + [reason]: Pluck the fragile leaves and chew them, careful not to swallow to add 1[harm] to this feature, soothe 1 fatigue, and draw 1 Ranger card.
If there is an active prey, exhaust it. »» Add [progress] to it and [harm] to this feature equal to that prey's presence.
Obstacle.
FOC + [exploration]: Inch [2] your way along precariously balanced rocks to move your [Ranger Token] to this feature. Then move this feature within reach of another Ranger.
Clear [harm]: If this feature is within reach of a Ranger, that Ranger suffers 2 injuries.
If the weather is inclement, the rocks begin to shift. »» Add 1[harm] to this feature.
Add 1[harm] to this feature.
Obstacle.
While your [Ranger Token] is on this feature your [Ranger Token] cannot be moved and [Progress] cannot be added to this feature.
FIT + [conflict]: Pull [2] apart the cloying webs to add 1[harm] to this feature for every 2 effort. If you fail, move your [Ranger Token] to this feature.
Move your [Ranger Token] to this feature. »» Move this feature within reach.
While your [Ranger Token] is on this feature, it cannot fatigue you.
SPI + [reason]: Brave [2] the unstable bridge as the ropes groan beneath your feet to move your [Ranger Token] to this feature.
Clear [harm]: Discard all [progress] from the location. Each Ranger with their [Ranger Token] on this feature suffers 1 injury.
Add 1[harm] to this feature.
While your [Ranger Token] is on this feature, you do not suffer fatigue from weather.
AWA + [Exploration]: Shelter [2] in the dark recess to exhaust this feature and move your [Ranger Token] to it.
If there are Nycta Bats in play, fluttering shadows emerge to join the swarm. »» Add 1 bat to each Nycta Bats.
If there is no active being, exhaust this feature. »» Search the path deck for the next being and put it into play.
